sections.title: At Work
sections.content: As a Software Engineer focused on solving problems using modern web technologies, I bring precision and reliability to every project. My approach is methodical yet creative, always aiming to deliver solutions that not only meet expectations but exceed them.
sections.alt: Vinícius working on software development projects

sections.title: Beyond Work
sections.content: I value balance between work and leisure, embracing the idea of creative idleness where stepping away from the desk often sparks the best solutions. Whether collaborating with a team or enjoying time at the beach, I approach life with openness and positivity, believing that rest and curiosity are as essential to progress as focus and discipline.
sections.alt: Vinícius enjoying work-life balance and outdoor activities

sections.title: Always Learning
sections.content: Curiosity drives me. I enjoy exploring new technologies, contributing to open source, and refining my craft. For me, growth is not only about technical skills but also about building meaningful connections and evolving as a person along the way.
sections.alt: Vinícius engaged in continuous learning and skill development
